markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 7" pfs="Standard">
[Unfolding Wind Blitz](/Spells.aspx?ID=1250)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 223

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You blitz forward so quickly that you soar through the air, and nothing can react to you. [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) up to twice your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions. At any point along the way, you can make Strikes with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack against up to three different targets within your reach. You increase your multiple attack penalty for these attacks only after completing all of the attacks.
name: Unfolding Wind Blitz
